content.text: William "Bill" Cress, is a fictional character played by Terrence Beasor in the television series The Office.

Bill Cress is the owner of Cress Tool & Die, one of the other businesses operating in Scranton Business Park. In the episode Chair Model, W.B. Jones Heating & Air goes under renovations and their construction vehicles take up parking spaces. As a result of this, the leaders of The Five Families of the business park is called to discuss the parking problem. The problem is resolved quickly. He is described by Kevin as really old and really mean.
